objects.specification: A wide flat rectangular floor panel covering the entire classroom footprint, finished in a light neutral matte material resembling polished concrete or vinyl with subtle texture for a bright, welcoming atmosphere and non-slip surface.
A tall vertical rectangular wall panel forming the front boundary of the classroom, surfaced in smooth off-white paint with a slight matte sheen for uniform brightness and clean sharp edges.

A tall vertical rectangular wall panel forming the back boundary of the classroom, finished in smooth off-white paint with a slight matte sheen for consistent brightness and a clean, professional look.
A tall vertical rectangular wall panel forming the left side of the classroom, coated in smooth off-white paint with minimalistic finish and uniform matte brightness.
A tall vertical rectangular wall panel forming the right side of the classroom, finished in smooth off-white paint with a slight matte sheen and crisp edges.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes, framed by slender clean-lined trim, allowing generous natural light into the room and featuring a slight reflective surface.
A soft flowing fabric curtain panel with gentle folds and pleats, draping gracefully alongside the window, colored in a complementary neutral tone for a balanced, inviting look.
A soft flowing fabric curtain panel with gentle folds and pleats, draping gracefully alongside the window, colored in a complementary neutral tone for a balanced, inviting look.
A simple modern rectangular wooden door with a smooth surface and minimalistic trim, painted in a light neutral color and featuring a subtle inset panel design.
A larger rectangular teacher’s desk with a darker wood-tone polished tabletop and sturdy legs, featuring smooth edges, modesty panel, and clean lines for a professional appearance.
A comfortable teacher’s chair with a supportive backrest and cushioned seat upholstered in a complementary tone, featuring ergonomic curves and a sturdy base.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white surface and thin metal frame, designed for easy writing and erasing, mounted flush to the wall with subtle rounded edges.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with sleek white housing, rounded edges, vent details, and a modern minimalist design for clear image projection onto the board.
A tall rectangular bookshelf constructed in light wood tone, featuring multiple open shelves neatly filled with colorful books of varying sizes and clean crisp lines.
A round wall clock with a thin neutral frame and clear minimalist face, featuring numeric markers or ticks and a classic school-style design.
A decorative potted plant featuring lush green foliage in a simple terracotta pot, with realistic leaf textures adding a touch of natural warmth to the corner.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
An educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant diagrams and informative text, mounted flat against the wall with minimalistic framing.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic, colored in neutral gray with an open top for easy disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic, colored in neutral gray with an open top for easy disposal.
A low-profile rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel and white housing, providing bright uniform illumination and flush-mounted with rounded corners.
A low-profile rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel and white housing, providing bright uniform illumination and flush-mounted with rounded corners.
